casebody.data:
Curtis PEARMAN, d/b/a Forest Park-Pearman, Appellant-Plaintiff,
v.
Rande MARTIN and R.L. Martin Associates, Inc. d/b/a Management Recruiters of Richmond, Appellees-Plaintiffs Court of Appeals Case No. 18A-CC-239 Court of Appeals of Indiana. FILED November 7, 2018

DISPOSITION OF CASE BY UNPUBLISHED MEMORANDUM DECISION

ALTICE , J.

Affirmed in part, reversed in part and remanded.

BROWN, J., Concurs.

TAVITAS, J., Concurs.
